item.title: PD: AAC Mentors
item.description: Tags: #aac Code: S Type: In-person Website: AGOSCI Description: AGOSCI is excited to announce a longstanding dream to rollout an AAC Mentors program.

item.title: PD: ISAAC Webinars
item.description: Tags: #aac Code: O Type: Online Website: ISAAC Description: Current, additional and archived webinars about AAC. < Home

item.title: PD: Key Word Sign
item.description: Tags: #aac #sign Code: O Type: Blended and in-person Cost: $200 Website: Key Word Sign Australia Description: Key Word Sign is a tool or strategy which can be used to support children and adults with communication difficulties to understand and get their message across to others.

item.title: PD: Liberator AAC Modules
item.description: Tags: #aac Code: O Type: Self-paced online Website: Liberator Description: Free AAC training provided by Liberator. Includes: Foundations of AAC ACCESS training, required to access Liberator's free AAC device trial scheme < Home
